competition_summary.context: competition, and higher returns for publishers. • Wurl is a connected TV (CTV) platform which primarily distributes streaming video for content companies, as well as provides solutions to maximize advertising revenue and attract consumers. In 2018, given an opportunity to scale our own apps using our Software Platform, insights, and expertise in the mobile app ecosystem, we launched AppLovin Apps (Apps). Today, our Apps consist of a globally diversified portfolio of over 350 free-to-play mobile
